abstract_summ: In December 2019, twenty‐seven pneumonia patients with unknown causes originated in South China seafood market in Wuhan . The virus infection spread rapidly and swept through China in less than a month . The outbreak of novel coronavirus has been determined as a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC) by WHO on January 31, 2020 . Unfortunately, till now the virus has spread to over 200 countries/territories/areas around the world .
